chapter.title: Setting up the Example Application
chapter.para: This chapter describes the different steps you should take to get the application up and running.

section.title: Download the application
section.para: Download the Example Application as a stand-alone program HERE. No additional software is required.
As an alternative you can download the Example Application as .war file HERE. Use this alternative when you have an application server available to deploy the .war file.

section.title: Run the application
section.para: The Example Application can be run by PROCESS.
Access the example web GIS application using your web browser on the following URL: localhostXXX
